KnowledgeBase.Title: fileErase
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: fileOpen fileClose fileRead fileWrite writeln display

Function.Description: The fileErase function erases a file with the specified file and path name.

Brief.Overview: The fileErase function erases a file with the specified file and path name {filePathName} .
Brief.Usage: The fileErase function is used to erase a file.

Syntax.Expression:
(fileErase filePathName)

filePathName The file and path name recognized by the host operating system.

Word

If the erase is successful, the Boolean value, true is returned
